name: Dotlogics
description:
Dotlogics is a digital agency in New York, founded in 2003. We are 100% independent and owner-managed.  We believe the user comes first. We have no sales team and are completely project driven. Expect creativity, technology, and creative thinking.
We define your website strategy to ensure that your online presence is effective and engaging for your consumer. We include a full host of research to dig deep into the heart of your industry and create powerful solutions for your brand.
We put the customer experience at the core of your design, focusing on ease of use along with alluring aesthetics and engaging content that results in clean, effective design. We have the knowledge and experience to craft accessible and well documented code, providing you with the right tools to fit your needs, even if it means building from scratch. 
We combine search terms that are relevant to your business with beautifully built websites that search engines love, resulting in top-notch placement. We’ll help you with a plan to ensure that you’re reaching your goals for years to come.
